General.Name: Eutilex.Co.Ltd
General.Description: Eutilex.Co.,Ltd. discovers and develops immunomodulatory antibody therapeutics to treat cancers and autoimmune diseases. It develops anti-tumor T cell therapy and antibody therapeutics. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

4.Name: Ms. So Heui  Choe J.D., Ph.D.
4.Title: Chief Compliance Officer
